context: By 2020, Amplitude had matured into one of the largest players in the digital analytics space with more than 2,400 customers after emerging from stealth mode in 2014. The competitive landscape had expanded significantly with both specialized product analytics tools and broader business intelligence platforms. Amplitude's pricing for the most affordable plan was around $12,000 per year in 2020. PostHog entered the market in 2020 as an open-source alternative.
